directions: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher, cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or up to 48 hours before serving. Serve over ice.
ingredients: 1/4 cup simple syrup (equal amounts sugar and water, heated until sugar dissolves, cooled)
1 large orange, halved and thinly sliced
1 green apple, cored, halved and thinly sliced
title: Pomegranate Sangria
